subject:
Re: Comparision of Git & Bzr [was Re: Short HOWTO on using git for
 Samba development]
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

James Peach wrote:

> We absolutely must have the author history, if only to maintain correct
> copyright attributions when moving code around.
> 
>> I don't really like this idea unless there is no other way
>> though.
> 
> If that's the only way, I'd rather stick with svn, 
> even though I quite like git :)

It's only an issue with bzr and performance.    I did a full
svn import a few weeks ago so its a little out of date but
enough to illustrate the functionality.  You can grab the repo
from git://git.samba.org/jerry/samba-svnimport





cheers, jerry
